author: adagov.org
title: ₳GOV: URL Conversations
description: What does a good governance user experience look like? Current DAO platforms are targeted toward bringing content INTO a closed platform.
solution: Build a browser extension that brings the community TO online resources, allows them to mark up, comment and raise flags on content.
experience: 1 x Systems Engineering, 1 x Social System Designer, 1 x PM and (Soficoop) Software Development Cooperative. Adagov Funded F4, F5, F6.
